title: The ancient liberty of the Britannick church, and the legitimate exemption thereof from the Roman patriarchate discoursed on four positions, and asserted / by Isaac Basier ... ; three chapters concerning the priviledges of the Britannick church, &c., selected out of a Latin manuscript, entituled, Catholico-romanus pacificus, written by F.I. Barnes ... ; translated, and published for vulgar instruction, by Ri. Watson.
author: Basier, Isaac, 1607-1676.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for John Mileson, to bee [sic] sold by Elisha Wallis ...,
